timeline.bodyText: minor: I think naming this var occurrence or positional makes it more clear.
timeline.author: seut

replies.bodyText: It is named field in the PostgreSQL documentation. I changed it to index for the Crate documentation but used field in the implementation. I just pushed a change to use index everywhere. If you prefer occurrence or positional I can also change it to that.
replies.author: peterzeller
